name: Thermal Slime
description:
Join and split to freeze and melt your way to an escape in this puzzle adventure! As you progress, you will gain fire and ice slimes to solve puzzles and interact with the dungeon in new ways. It's admittedly incomplete, but that's how some jams go!

––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––

CONTROLS:

  • Movement: WASD or Arrow Keys
  • Change Slime: Tab or Space
  • Split Fire: 1
  • Split Ice: 2
  • Split slimes are thrown to the cursor/mouse position

––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––

PUZZLE HINTS:

  • You can throw a slime faster than you can move
  • Slimes can be thrown over gaps and water
  • Fire and ice cancel each other out

––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––

MADE FOR GMTK GAME JAM 2020 by a team of 2
